1.name: Cleanse
1.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and gives Tenacity.

3.name: Exhaust
3.description: Slows target enemy champion and reduces their damage dealt.

4.name: Flash
4.description: Teleports you a short distance toward your cursor.

6.name: Ghost
6.description: Gain Move Speed and ignore unit collision for the duration.

7.name: Heal
7.description: Restores Health and grants Move Speed to you and target allied champion.

11.name: Smite
11.description: Deals true damage to a monster or minion.

12.name: Teleport
12.description: After a brief channel, become untargetable and travel to an allied unit. Upgrades into Unleashed Teleport, which significantly increases travel speed.

13.name: Clarity
13.description: Restores your and ally champion's Mana.

14.name: Ignite
14.description: Deals true damage over time to target enemy champion and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

30.name: To the King!
30.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

31.name: Poro Toss
31.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

32.name: Mark
32.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

39.name: Mark
39.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

54.name: Placeholder
54.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!

55.name: Placeholder and Attack-Smite
55.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!

2201.name: Flee
2201.description: Gain a short burst of Move Speed, increased while running away from enemy champions.

2202.name: Flash
2202.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
